body.description: The 3-in-1 cleaning power in this clear, recyclable bottle fights tough dirt + stains with every wash, keeping whites white and colors bright. Made with powerful plant-based stain lifters and fabulous, lasting fragrances, one little capful of concentrated formula takes care of one big load.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I "discovered" Method cleaning products one year when my son came out to visit. He's lived overseas for the past 15 years - starting in Australia. Those Aussie's tend to be pretty green with their products and when he saw I was still using the same laundry detergent I'd used all his life (the same detergent my mother used) he "suggested" I try Method. In all fairness at the time it was less than HALF the price of my old detergent; but, being of the old school and having tried other "green" products that just didn't work I wasn't particularly open to it. He said he'd buy it because his girlfriend wasn't going to wash her clothes until they got back home because of the detergent I had and all the chemicals in it and, frankly, he didn't want to take dirty clothes back to Aus when he could wash them at Mom's!The old saying, "You can't teach an old dog new tricks" is NOT entirely correct. I was impressed with the small amount you needed to use and yet the clothes came out clean and SMELLING clean. (It makes me crazy when I see those commercials on TV about a "scent freshener" you add to your laundry to make it smell clean. If you wash your clothes in a detergent that works -- your clothes should smell clean because they ARE clean!!) Anyway, that was 6 years ago and I've been using Method Laundry Detergent ever since. I like that my clothes are clean, it's good (not bad) for the environment, and even though it's not as easy to find as it used to be (thank goodness for Amazon), it's available and still cheaper than the "national brands"! If you have sensitive skin or have little ones and infants, this product is safe for you as it doesn't have all those nasty chemicals that our national brands do. Definitely a win-win!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean Laundry Detergent
reviews.reviewText: Method laundry detergent is now a household staple in my house. First of all, I really like that it is a clean detergent without any added chemicals. It cleans my clothes well without any residue. My goal has been to clean up those added chemicals manufacturers ad to the brands that we use on our bodies. I feel better today about the products I choose today. I like that now I have options. This option of detergent for me has been a great transition . The scents are very nice and not overwhelming at all. They have many different scents and also make an unscented variety.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great smell, cleans clothes
reviews.reviewText: I like this detergent a lot. I use it for the whole family- kids/adults. The scent is fresh and clean and not overpowering. The detergent seems lighter and more effective in a less “harsh” way then the other leading brands. Will continue to use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clothes smell great
reviews.reviewText: Love the scent of Fresh Air. Clothes come out smelling so clean without a perfume smell. Use very little for a large load. So cost is very efficient.Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product works well. I also think my bedsheets came out whiter than they were before. The scent is not very strong and doesn’t last long once the washing comes out of the machine, but the product still works. I like that it is cruelty free and uses natural ingredients without harsh chemicals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells good, better on the environment
reviews.reviewText: There’s not much not to like about this detergent. I purchased the Fresh Air scent. You only need to use a capful for a regular load and I use two for a large load. Smells great when you pull it out of the washing machine! I respect Method for making products that are better for the environment too, a win-win.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Washed clothes great and good smell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it for my husband's laundry. Just a little washes a huge load of clothing.

I like this scent and it works well to reduce static. (I also use wool dryer balls for maximum effect). I love that the dryer sheets & all packaging are biodegradable. It doesn't make sense to me to buy liquid fabric softener in a giant plastic container when this fabulous eco-friendly alternative is available.

I love these Method dryer papers. The scent is subtle, they do the trick and best of all they will decompose !!!!!The deal on Amazon is bar none. They average between $8-$12/ box in grocery store. Highly recommend
It works really well and has an amazing fragrance. It is now selling locally for $21a bottle so this is a great deal.

I really expected a little bit more from these dryer sheets :( I loved the value pack idea and natural brand & values but the scent was really lacking for me. I know with natural it’s supposed to be a lot less strong than mainstream products but it really missed for me as my clothes had virtually no clean smell even if I tossed in like 10 sheets per load :,(
I was surprised at how strong the scent is on these ones. I likely would opt for the ginger mango or beach sage next time as I didn’t mind those scents.
